text: @Tobias_Ellwood What did you expect Mr Elwood? Johnson advised people to use their common sense, & in business questions today, Mr Mogg praised the good sense of the British people? Until Covid-19 is eradicated we need clear, uncomplicated, & enforceable rules, not government by Bojo the Clown.
